metadata.inclusion:
1. Insert 3 AA batteries into the battery compartment with correct polarity
2. HD-9 will emit a 2-tone beep
3. Press the Test Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds
4. HD-9 will emit another 2-tone beep
metadata.exclusion: Press the Test Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The Heat Detector will be removed from the Z-Wave network.
metadata.reset:
1. Press and hold the Test Button
2. While holding the Test Button, power on the Heat Detector
3. Wait for 10 seconds to complete factory reset
